name: Meteor Rush (playfull)
description:
Meteor Rush is an exciting mobile game that puts your reflexes and speed to the test. In this thrilling adventure, you'll have to dodge an onslaught of meteors, collecting coins and power-ups as you go. With the ability to unlock new characters and compete on the leaderboards, Meteor Rush is an addictive game that's perfect for anyone looking for a fast-paced challenge.

Download Meteor Rush now and jump right in the action!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.playfull.meteorrush
